name: Beat Dungeon (Johax)
description:
Miniproject for Theory of Game Design and Development

In this game the pace is determined by the music, actors perform actions and build power in tune to the beat as the player tries to fight their way through a randomly generated dungeon!

Controls: WASD for movement, mouse pointer or keyboard for aiming.

Trailer: https://youtu.be/xLJJG0WAKOI
